alert.note: Alert for Noatak Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 6:19AM AKST until January 12 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Noatak Valley. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds and ice accumulation could cause damage to power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow with low visibility is expected to develop by noon today and continue into Friday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
